name: Landlord
ability: You start knowing the in-play character nearest the top of the script (besides the Landlord).
firstNightReminder: Show the Landlord the in-play character token nearest the top of the script (excluding Landlord).
flavor: You'll be staying here. I know it's not ideal. Put in a request with maintenance. They should be able to fix it in a few months.

name: Guide
ability: You start knowing one out-of-play Minion and one out-of-play Outsider, if possible.
firstNightReminder: Show the Guide 1 out-of-play Minion token and 1 out-of-play Outsider token, if possible.
flavor: I know a shortcut.

name: Investor
ability: You start knowing three characters, two of which are Demon bluffs.
firstNightReminder: Show the Investor 3 character tokens, 2 of which are Demon bluffs.
flavor: Short it.

name: Baker
ability: Once per game, choose a player: They become sober and healthy, and cannot become drunk or poisoned.
firstNightReminder: Ask the Baker if they want to use their ability. If they do, they choose a player; mark that player as unaffected by drunkenness and poisoning.
otherNightReminder: If the Baker has not used their ability, wake them. If they choose to use their ability, they choose a player; mark that player as unaffected by drunkenness and poisoning.
flavor: You get what you pay for. And a little more than that.

name: Quartermaster
ability: Once per game, choose a player: they act twice tonight.
firstNightReminder: If the Quartermaster has not used their ability, wake them. If they choose to use their ability, they choose a player; that player acts twice tonight.
otherNightReminder: If the Quartermaster has not used their ability, wake them. If they choose to use their ability, they choose a player; that player acts twice tonight.
flavor: New order's in. Get to work. No breaks.

name: Mailman
ability: Each night*, choose three players. You learn if any are evil.
otherNightReminder: Wake the Mailman. They choose 3 players. Show YES if any are evil, otherwise NO.
flavor: Mail call!

name: Coroner
ability: Each night*, choose a dead player. You learn how they died.
otherNightReminder: Wake the Coroner. They choose a dead player. Explain that player’s cause of death.
flavor: Get me the vitreous sample. I have a theory.

name: Martyr
ability: If you were executed today, two players learn your role tonight.
otherNightReminder: If the Martyr was executed today, wake 2 players and show them the Martyr token.
flavor: Though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil.

name: Anomalist
ability: Once per game, you may publicly guess a player as an Outsider. If correct, they become an out-of-play Townsfolk.
flavor: Its mere existence stuns the brain and numbs us with the black extra-cosmic gulfs it throws open before our frenzied eyes. And I intend to study it.

name: Doctor
ability: You learn when players would die. Once per game, you may prevent a death.
otherNightReminder: When a player would die, inform the Doctor. If unused, the Doctor may choose to prevent that death.
flavor: Time of death, twelve o' clock a.m. on the dot.

name: Captain
ability: On your first night, choose a player: the first time you would die at night, that player dies instead.
flavor: Gooooooood morning, crew.

name: Fire Eater
ability: Each day, you may publicly guess any number of players’ characters. Tonight, you learn if you were correct.
otherNightReminder: Wake the Fire Eater. Show YES if all of their guesses were correct, otherwise NO.
flavor: Aha! It is impossible, yes? No! Watch!

name: Clown
ability: You must nominate a living player each day. Townsfolk you nominate are poisoned until dawn. Opposing players you nominate act twice tonight.
flavor: honk

name: Mime
ability: If you are chosen by a Townsfolk, you die immediately.
otherNightReminder: If the Mime is chosen by a Townsfolk ability, kill the Mime immediately.

name: Beast
ability: Good cannot win if the first player to nominate you is alive, even if you are dead.
flavor: Get out!

name: Sword Swallower
ability: Each day, you may publicly swallow a sword. If you don't, a player of your alignment is poisoned until dawn. When you swallow your third sword, you die tonight.
flavor: I've done this a thousand times. What's one more?

name: Enchanter
ability: Each night*, choose a player: if they used their ability tonight, you choose the ability's targets. If not, you learn their role.
otherNightReminder: Wake the Enchanter. They choose a player. If that player used their ability tonight, the Enchanter chooses its targets. Otherwise, show that player’s character token.
flavor: It has been a long day. Sleep. Let me handle this for you.

name: Fatale
ability: The first Townsfolk who chooses you with their ability each night dies.
otherNightReminder: Each night, the first Townsfolk who chooses the Fatale dies.
flavor: Perhaps we can discuss this somewhere... privately?

name: Flagellant
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they die. You become an evil Outsider. [-1 Outsider]
otherNightReminder: If the Flagellant has not used their ability, wake them. They may choose a player to die. Then the Flagellant becomes an evil Outsider.
flavor: AAAAAAAAAGGGGGHHHH!!

name: Showman
ability: Evil wins if all Outsiders and the Demon are dead. [+1 Outsider]
flavor: Prepare to be amazed!

name: Owlglass
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Executed players do not die until the beginning of night.
otherNightReminder: Wake the Owlglass. They choose a player to die. At the start of each night, resolve any pending execution deaths.
flavor: This day have ye brought me out to be hanged up; but see ye the halter wherewith ye would hang me is a new one.
